channel.title: Is it weird to work on an old song?
channel.description: I recently want to finish this song I started about a month or 2 ago. But I think it’s woerd because if I post it after my recent song it will be wierd and I feel like it should be before my new songs... idk please help

item.title: Is it weird to work on an old song?
item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:
I am going to be realeasing my very first song again so that I can see how much I have improved.

Read full topic

item.source: Is it weird to work on an old song?

item.title: Is it weird to work on an old song?
item.dc:creator: moemx
item.description:
same here, I’ve got plenty of old stuff in my hard drive, some of it about 10 years ago. Since I knew nothing about music production back than it was just basic brainstorming stuff / musical ideas. And I love browsing through them today to either use parts in a new song or finish them after all.

That’s your musics journey my man. Honor the past and embrace progress

If that’s not motivational, i don’t know what is…

Read full topic
item.source: Is it weird to work on an old song?

item.title: Is it weird to work on an old song?
item.dc:creator: yaneeck
item.description:
Five years ago I made a track. It was awful when it comes to instruments, but the melody was quite nice.
Then I spent five years doing absolutely nothing with music, but that track was unfinished for me, so this year I decided to get back to it and “close the case”.
So I made it a little shorter, I gave it a better “sound” and now you can hear it as https://soundcloud.com/yaneeck/intermission-i

To sum up: no, it’s not weird to work on an old song

Read full topic
